result.html: An bus díreach é seoIs this a direct bus?

result.eng: How good is the country's bus network?

result.eng: Do not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.
result.ga: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseacht

result.ponchtml: Ná laḃair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseaċtDo not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.

result.html: Tá an bus ag teachtThe bus is coming.
result.ponchtml: Tá an bus ag teaċtThe bus is coming.

result.eng: We want to get a bus from Galway to Ros an Mhíl to get the boat to Inis Mór.
result.ga: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil ó Ghaillimh go Ros an Mhíl leis an mbád a fháil go hInis Mór
result.orig: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil ó Ghaillimh go Ros an Mhíl leis an mbád a fháil go hInis Mór

result.ponchtml: Táimid ag iarraiḋ bus a ḟáil ó Ġailliṁ go Ros an Ṁíl leis an mbád a ḟáil go hInis MórWe want to get a bus from Galway to Ros an Mhíl to get the boat to Inis Mór.

result.eng: We want to get a bus today, if we can.

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.

result.eng: Only poor people take the bus.
result.ga: Ní thógann ach daoine bochta an bus
